data.title: Meppel → Dordrecht by Train
data.meta_description: Travel by train from Meppel to Dordrecht in 2h 26m. Get train times, compare prices & buy cheap train tickets for Meppel to Dordrecht today.
data.text:
Looking to travel from Meppel to Dordrecht by train? You've come to the right place!

On average, it takes around 3 hours 4 minutes to travel from Meppel to Dordrecht by train, the fastest services can get you there in as little as 2 hours 26 minutes though. You'll usually find 59 trains per day running along the 89 miles (143 km) route between these two destinations. You’ll need to make 1 change during the journey to Dordrecht, as there currently aren't any direct services on this route.

Plan your trip ahead and book your train tickets in advance if you want to snap up the cheapest fares. Just start a search in our Journey Planner to view the latest prices for trains from Meppel to Dordrecht.

If you’re feeling ready to book, start looking for cheap train tickets with us today. Keep reading for more information on the journey to Dordrecht by train, including our timetable where you can view first and last train times.
